body:
Reported by jazevec:

Once in a while Creeping Tar pit will automatically "pay for itself", which causes it to become a tapped creature until end of turn. Sometimes it behaves this way all the time, other times it works exactly as expected.
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: Creeping Tar Pit can pay for itself

comments.body:
Please take note that I'm the original person who reported it.

I think I know what happened, and this issue should be closed. My mouse (Razer Krait, no longer sold piece of garbage) is falling apart and sometimes it double clicks instead of a single click.
comments.author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)

content:
_From [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/) on June 15, 2012 15:03:43_

Reported by jazevec:

Once in a while Creeping Tar pit will automatically "pay for itself", which causes it to become a tapped creature until end of turn. Sometimes it behaves this way all the time, other times it works exactly as expected.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=225_
